metadata.title: CVE-2017-15370 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the ImaExpandS function ofima_rw.c in Sound eXchange (SoX) 14.4.2. A Crafted input will lead to adenial of service attack during conversion of an audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
libsox2 - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
sox - 14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.1-3ubuntu1.1').
